title: 在茶馆一天能领多少锭？
author: 幽儿~
txt_content:
你这是吞锭 不是领的 我历史最高也就15个 再说了 这是少见了 





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: skyinr
replies.txt_content: 标题: 在茶馆一天能领多少锭？今天我就领了差不多20个...

replies.author: xiaoma636
replies.txt_content:
要是时时刻刻守着还是很可观的
然而这是句废话=-=

replies.author: 白桦树树干
replies.txt_content: 要金锭又没什么用，守着一天也不值当的

replies.author: 金蛋之魂
replies.txt_content: 国庆节的时候一天领了五个

replies.author: lanmao521
replies.txt_content: 我最高一天领1个QAQ每次都抢不到

replies.author: Aeon_
replies.txt_content: 有那么多吗 最多一天也就五六个吧
你这是吞锭 不是领的 我历史最高也就15个 再说了 这是少见了
